parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Disable the ability to talk to other people. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''disableConversation''' disable </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> disable: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>[[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[disableConversation]] [[true]]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>soldier1 [[disableConversation]] [[true]]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setSpeaker]], [[enableRadio]], [[enableSentences]], [[showSubtitles]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

<h3 style='display:none'>Notes</h3>
<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 10, 2009 - 23:28 (CEST)
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]
<dd class="note">
Note that this will also prevent you from using group radio.<br>
If you just want player unable to speak to others (or one particular soldier),<br>
use <code>player [[setVariable]] ["BIS_noCoreConversations", true];</code>
<br>
or, for the other soldier,
<code>unitName [[setVariable]] ["BIS_noCoreConversations", true];</code>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 18, 2010 - 21:24 (CEST)
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]
<dd class="note">
My previous note is incorrect now, you can use '''disableConversation''' and still use the group radio, at least in A2:OA !

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<h3 style='display:none'>Bottom Section</h3>
